area.key:
There are files in the client dependency cache are older than those in the scripts and css folders.

This might mean that recent changes to your site are not being shown.

You can increment the client version or clear the client dependency cache to ensure updates are included.

  • Oldest Cache Files: %0%
  • Newest script/css file: %1%
Client Dependenct cache is upto date

The files in the client depdendency cache are more recent than those in the scripts or css folders

This check only compares the files in the css and scripts folders, other folders might have files that affect how the client dependency cache is built.
